posts.post_content: He is not great to be sure but combine him with [Tolarian Academy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tolarian Academy)in a blue/white/black zombie deck and you have a useful footsoldier. He benefits from tribal bonuses and allows to put [philactery lich](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=philactery lich) when you need for a 5/5 indestructable drop. He does play well with others.
